# Packages
```{r}
#| include: false
required_packages <- c(
  "tidyverse", "here", "tmap", "sf"
)

lapply(required_packages, function(pkg) {
  if (!require(pkg, character.only = TRUE)) install.packages(pkg)
  library(pkg, character.only = TRUE)
})
```
